FREQ_MEASURE (FB)

Â¶
FUNCTION_BLOCK FREQ_MEASURE
Measures the frequency of a signal
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Initial
Comment
Input
IN
BOOL
Input signal
PERIODS
INT (1..10)
1
A period is the time between two rising edges of the input signal.
OUT
will equal the average frequency during the given
PERIODS
(number of periods; minimal 1 maximal 10).
The function block will not work unless this value is between 1 and 10.
RESET
BOOL
Reset measurement
Output
OUT
REAL
Frequency [Hz]
VALID
BOOL
FALSE
: As long as the first measure has been finished.  Or time distance between two rising edges >
3
*
OUT
.
(Indicates that something is wrong with the inputs)
